title: Mystical Arrival
description_1:
Magic appears only when the universe calls!
These rare treasures arrive unannounced,
lingering only for a fleeting moment.
description_2:
Will you be
the one to embrace the magic this time?

products.name: Magic Keychain
products.desc: Like a talisman, it attracts luck, provides protection, and activates positive energy.

products.name: Magical Perfume
products.desc: The magical perfume bottle is crafted from rare ingredients and uniquely made with ancient spells.

products.name:
Super Magic'
Charm Bag
products.desc: A Spell is a small portable bottle that holds energy and a mystical fragrance.

products.name:
Crystal Bracelet
Random
products.desc: Appears randomly at different times of Nina's energy.
